artist: Author: Alois Senefelder; Author: Preface by Fredrich von Schlichtegroll; Translator: Alois Senefelder; Publisher: Rudolph Ackermann
description: 342 [2] pp., 14 plates (1 folding), including color frontispiece, portraits, facsimiles. A technical manual describing apparatus, papers, colors, chemicals, presses, etc., in detail. PART FIRST: HISTORY OF THE ART OF LITHOGRAPHY and then, PART II: ART OF LITHOGRAPHY, CONTAINING INSTRUCTIONS IN THE DIFFERENT BRANCHES AND MANNERS.
provenance: Source unknown, possibly transferred from MIA Library (no library markings noted).
title: A Complete Course of Lithography, Containing Clear and Explicit Instructions in all the Different Branches and Manners of that Art...
